overview: Mr. Loomis was previously the founder & CEO of Net Enforcers, a private online security company focused on counterfeit and corporate brand protection technology services. Mr. Loomis grew Net Enforcers into a multi-million dollar business solely under its own capital stream with no outside investment and secured customers like Apple, Microsoft, Cisco and Pfizer. In 2007, Mr. Loomis successfully sold Net Enforcers.com, debt-free and profitable. Mr. Loomis is noted for an intense passion and determination to succeed within the start-up environment. He has an electrical engineering background and holds a Business Management degree. A formally licensed Private Investigator, Mr. Loomis is also a cooperative member with the FBI and DEAâ€™s divisions on Cybercrime.
